name: RWBY Side Bar Text - Tumblr
additional_info:
Original code by castisass in their Doctor Who Side Bar code.
I just replaced the Doctor Who references with RWBY references.

April 8th, 2015: Due to Tumblr's update, this style does not work anymore. However, I'm working to find a Style or something that will be able to make this Style useful again. Don't worry!

November 15th, 2015: Partially works with X-Kit's Old Stats extension. May not work with "Likes", "Following", and "Spotlight". Will continue to work to find ways around this. Other glitches include the "Activity Bar" not working properly on the main dashboard, but working on pages that you hit "Open Link in New Tab" on the reblog button to open, reblog, and post as well as non-dashboard pages that feature the "Activity Bar" in the side bar like the Queue and Activity pages.
